description: Searches contacts in an Amazon Connect instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: TimeRange
parameters.description: Time range that you want to search results. The type of timestamp to search. The start time of the time range. The end time of the time range.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The type of timestamp to search.

nested_params.name: StartTime
nested_params.description: The start time of the time range.

nested_params.name: EndTime
nested_params.description: The end time of the time range.

parameters.name: SearchCriteria
parameters.description: The search criteria to be used to return contacts. AgentIds (list) --- The identifiers of agents who handled the contacts. (string) --- AgentHierarchyGroups (dict) --- The agent hierarchy groups of the agent at the time of handling the contact. L1Ids (list) --- The identifiers for level 1 hierarchy groups. (string) --- L2Ids (list) --- The identifiers for level 2 hierarchy groups. (string) --- L3Ids (list) --- The identifiers for level 3 hierarchy groups. (string) --- L4Ids (list) --- The identifiers for level 4 hierarchy groups. (string) --- L5Ids (list) --- The identifiers for level 5 hierarchy groups. (string) --- Channels (list) --- The list of channels associated with contacts. (string) --- ContactAnalysis (dict) --- Search criteria based on analysis outputs from Amazon Connect Contact Lens. Transcript (dict) --- Search criteria based on transcript analyzed by Amazon Connect Contact Lens. The list of search criteria based on Contact Lens conversational analytics transcript. (dict) --- A structure that defines search criteria base on words or phrases, participants in the Contact Lens conversational analytics transcript. The participant role in a transcript The words or phrases used to search within a transcript. (string) --- The match type combining search criteria using multiple search texts in a transcript criteria. MatchType (string) --- The match type combining search criteria using multiple transcript criteria. InitiationMethods (list) --- The list of initiation methods associated with contacts. (string) --- QueueIds (list) --- The list of queue IDs associated with contacts. (string) --- SearchableContactAttributes (dict) --- The search criteria based on user-defined contact attributes that have been configured for contact search. For more information, see Search by custom contact attributes in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide. The list of criteria based on user-defined contact attributes that are configured for contact search. (dict) --- The search criteria based on user-defined contact attribute key and values to search on. The key containing a searchable user-defined contact attribute. The list of values to search for within a user-defined contact attribute. (string) --- MatchType (string) --- The match type combining search criteria using multiple searchable contact attributes. SearchableSegmentAttributes (dict) --- The search criteria based on searchable segment attributes of a contact. The list of criteria based on searchable segment attributes. (dict) --- The search criteria based on searchable segment attribute key and values to search on. The key containing a searchable segment attribute. The list of values to search for within a searchable segment attribute. (string) --- MatchType (string) --- The match type combining search criteria using multiple searchable segment attributes.

nested_params.name: AgentIds
nested_params.description: The identifiers of agents who handled the contacts.

nested_params.name: AgentHierarchyGroups
nested_params.description: The agent hierarchy groups of the agent at the time of handling the contact.

nested_params.name: L1Ids
nested_params.description: The identifiers for level 1 hierarchy groups.

nested_params.name: L2Ids
nested_params.description: The identifiers for level 2 hierarchy groups.

nested_params.name: L3Ids
nested_params.description: The identifiers for level 3 hierarchy groups.

nested_params.name: L4Ids
nested_params.description: The identifiers for level 4 hierarchy groups.

nested_params.name: L5Ids
nested_params.description: The identifiers for level 5 hierarchy groups.

nested_params.name: Channels
nested_params.description: The list of channels associated with contacts.

nested_params.name: ContactAnalysis
nested_params.description: Search criteria based on analysis outputs from Amazon Connect Contact Lens.

nested_params.name: Transcript
nested_params.description: Search criteria based on transcript analyzed by Amazon Connect Contact Lens.

nested_params.name: Criteria
nested_params.description: The list of search criteria based on Contact Lens conversational analytics transcript.

nested_params.name: ParticipantRole
nested_params.description: The participant role in a transcript.

nested_params.name: SearchText
nested_params.description: The words or phrases used to search within a transcript.

nested_params.name: MatchType
nested_params.description: The match type combining search criteria using multiple search texts in a transcript criteria.

nested_params.name: MatchType
nested_params.description: The match type combining search criteria using multiple transcript criteria.

nested_params.name: InitiationMethods
nested_params.description: The list of initiation methods associated with contacts.

nested_params.name: QueueIds
nested_params.description: The list of queue IDs associated with contacts.

nested_params.name: SearchableContactAttributes
nested_params.description: The search criteria based on user-defined contact attributes that have been configured for contact search. For more information, see Search by custom contact attributes in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.

nested_params.name: Criteria
nested_params.description: The list of criteria based on user-defined contact attributes that are configured for contact search.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key containing a searchable user-defined contact attribute.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The list of values to search for within a user-defined contact attribute.

nested_params.name: MatchType
nested_params.description: The match type combining search criteria using multiple searchable contact attributes.

nested_params.name: SearchableSegmentAttributes
nested_params.description: The search criteria based on searchable segment attributes of a contact.

nested_params.name: Criteria
nested_params.description: The list of criteria based on searchable segment attributes.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key containing a searchable segment attribute.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The list of values to search for within a searchable segment attribute.

nested_params.name: MatchType
nested_params.description: The match type combining search criteria using multiple searchable segment attributes.

parameters.name: Sort
parameters.description: Specifies a field to sort by and a sort order. The name of the field on which to sort. An ascending or descending sort.

nested_params.name: FieldName
nested_params.description: The name of the field on which to sort.

nested_params.name: Order
nested_params.description: An ascending or descending sort.

nested_items.name: Contacts
nested_items.description: Information about the contacts.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the contact summary.

nested_items.name: InitialContactId
nested_items.description: If this contact is related to other contacts, this is the ID of the initial contact.

nested_items.name: PreviousContactId
nested_items.description: If this contact is not the first contact, this is the ID of the previous contact.

nested_items.name: InitiationMethod
nested_items.description: Indicates how the contact was initiated.

nested_items.name: Channel
nested_items.description: How the contact reached your contact center.

nested_items.name: QueueInfo
nested_items.description: If this contact was queued, this contains information about the queue.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the queue.

nested_items.name: EnqueueTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the contact was added to the queue.

nested_items.name: AgentInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the agent who accepted the contact.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the agent who accepted the contact.

nested_items.name: ConnectedToAgentTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the contact was connected to the agent.

nested_items.name: InitiationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time this contact was initiated, in UTC time. For INBOUND, this is when the contact arrived. For OUTBOUND, this is when the agent began dialing. For CALLBACK, this is when the callback contact was created. For TRANSFER and QUEUE_TRANSFER, this is when the transfer was initiated. For API, this is when the request arrived. For EXTERNAL_OUTBOUND, this is when the agent started dialing the external participant. For MONITOR, this is when the supervisor started listening to a contact.

nested_items.name: DisconnectTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the customer endpoint disconnected from Amazon Connect.

nested_items.name: ScheduledTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp, in Unix epoch time format, at which to start running the inbound flow.

nested_items.name: SegmentAttributes
nested_items.description: Set of segment attributes for a contact.

nested_items.name: ValueString
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: ValueString
nested_items.description: The value of a segment attribute represented as a string.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of contacts which matched your search query.
